title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list does not persist between sessions.
SR:
1. Launch the application. 
2. Open multiple files. 
3. Close the application. 
4. Relaunch the application. 
5. Check the File menu MRU list to see if the previously opened files are still listed.
